Readme

Random123.jl

Julia implementation of Random123

Linux, OSX:

Windows:

Code Coverage:

See RandomNumbers.jl for details. The documentation is also hosted there.

Installation

This package is registered. The stable version of this package requires Julia 0.7+. You can install it by:

(v1.1) pkg> add Random123

And then you can run the tests:

(v1.1) pkg> test Random123

This package is under MIT License. The original license of Random123 can be found here.
